last_episode_to_air.name: The Parent Trapped
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kendra's Sin City debut spins out of control when her mom and dad clash in a shocking family fiasco 20 years in the making; a surprise visitor spills Patti's shocking secret, leaving Kendra fuming.

name: Kendra on Top
overview: Kendra on Top is an American reality television series on WE tv that debuted June 5, 2012. The series follows the day-to-day life of former Playboy model and The Girls Next Door reality television personality Kendra Wilkinson as she balances being a mother and her business ventures. Season 2 chronicles Kendra as she prepares and participates as a celebrity contestant on Splash and stars on Celebrity Wife Swap. Hank is working on his transition from working in the NFL into the business world. Kendra's car accident that occurred in April 2013 is also included.

episodes.name: Workin’ It
episodes.overview: Kendra wakes up late for a photo shoot, streaks and goes clubbing with her girls until three in the morning. No longer a pro-football player, Hank explores TV hosting as his next career move.

episodes.name: Batteries Not Included
episodes.overview: Kendra researches products for her Love Candy collection, while Hank lands his first movie role.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Calabassas?
episodes.overview: Kendra is eager to show off her home for the first time at a special dinner party with Hugh Hefner and his girlfriends.

episodes.name: Kendra Takes Miami
episodes.overview: Kendra heads to sunny Florida to promote her new book and to party with her girlfriends. Plus, Hank is offered a once in a lifetime business opportunity. What is it? And will he accept it?

episodes.name: Kendra Goes Back to School
episodes.overview: Baby Hank's ready for school, but is Kendra? The preschool process includes parental interviews, but Kendra worries she will be judged for her wild ways. Will friend Bethany calm her nerves?

episodes.name: A Star Is Born
episodes.overview: After Little Hank steals the show at his first Hollywood Premiere red carpet, Kendra and Hank contemplate whether or not they should get him an agent.

episodes.name: Fore Play
episodes.overview: Kendra tees off at Hank’s celebrity golf scramble to benefit lung cancer research. A few shanks and duffs later, Kendra loses it as she struggles not to ruin Hank’s big day.

episodes.name: New York Kendra
episodes.overview: Kendra and Hank fly to NY for a photo shoot. Meeting up with friends, Julie and Jon, Kendra vents to Julie about Hank’s career. Jon and Hank discuss leaving the NFL. Tension forms between Kendra and Hank.

episodes.name: The Empire Statement
episodes.overview: Kendra bombards Hank’s agent with questions about NFL players’ career options, embarrassing Hank. A heated debate with Hank in addition to missing Little Hank leads to an explosive night.

episodes.name: Nashville or Bust
episodes.overview: After a week of work in New York, Kendra heads to Nashville for a music video shoot with the LoCash Cowboys.  But when she learns what her role in the video will involve, things get a little “muddy.”

episodes.name: LoCash Kendra
episodes.overview: Kendra gets down and dirty shooting a sexy music video in Nashville; Hank is conflicted after he finds out Kendra will be mud wrestling.

episodes.name: Risque Business
episodes.overview: Kendra tests new additions to her adult accessory kit, Love Candy. Hank moves forward with his next career after Travelle reveals a new training location. Kendra pressures Hank to get a contract.

episodes.name: Homeward Rebound
episodes.overview: Kendra confronts her past during a trip home.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: Kendra is forced into a showdown with an old rival and fears she is too flabby to represent her lingerie line in a photo shoot. Hank races against the clock to prepare for the opening of his new gym.

episodes.name: Trick or Tweet
episodes.overview: Kendra shows up in body paint at a playboy party unbeknownst to Hank. The naked stunt draws the ire of her agent and triggers a fight with her hubby.

episodes.name: Dangerous When Wet
episodes.overview: Kendra discovers “Splash” is more brutal than she imagined, challenging her fear of heights. She decides to quit the show on national TV.

episodes.name: The Ex Files
episodes.overview: Kendra runs into an ex at Hank's gym and she can’t decide whether or not to tell Hank. “Splash” wants Kendra and Hank to do a tandem dive together.

episodes.name: Crash Course
episodes.overview: Kendra gets into a terrible car accident. Hank comes to her rescue. Kendra tries to come to terms with the fact she may have had a stroke.

episodes.name: Mum Mum's the Word
episodes.overview: Kendra goes to San Diego to visit her family while she waits on test results from her MRI. Hank prepares a website for bootcamp in Turks & Caicos.

episodes.name: Miami Vices
episodes.overview: Hank sets up a birthday trip to Miami for Kendra and her friends. Problems with the Turks & Caicos bootcamp causes a rift between Hank and Travelle.

episodes.name: Homeland Insecurity
episodes.overview: Kendra is hurt that Jessica renewed her marriage vows without her there. Hank and Kendra fight over the cancellation of Turks & Caicos.

episodes.name: The Cold Wars
episodes.overview: Hank sleeps on the couch following a fight; Kendra meets with Playboy Radio; Travelle and Hank decide to remain partners at the gym.

episodes.name: Truce or Dare
episodes.overview: Kendra does her Playboy radio show tryout; Jessica urges Kendra to make up with Hank; Hank has a movie role opposite Bruce Jenner.

episodes.name: The Big Bare
episodes.overview: Pat McAfee gifts Kendra and Hank a trip to Big Bear for their fourth anniversary. Pat’s girlfriend, Kyle, Jessica, Travelle and his girlfriend join them.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: While partying in Big Bear Hank worries Kendra isn’t happy being married. Kendra and Hank are disappointed that Pat isn’t as fun as he used to be.

episodes.name: The Confidence Game
episodes.overview: Kendra has an anxiety attack during a test drive. Her therapist says she fears a lack of control. Kendra takes over Jessica’s Playboy shoot.

episodes.name: Pulling the Goalie
episodes.overview: While Hank is away on a guys’ only camping trip, Jessica accompanies Kendra at the doctor to have her IUD removed, whether Hank is on board or not!

episodes.name: High Wired
episodes.overview: Kendra hosts The World’s Biggest Bachelorette Party in Vegas. She’s asked to zipline her entrance. Kendra talks about expanding the family.

episodes.name: Spilled Milk
episodes.overview: Kendra and Hank give birth to a baby girl. Hank allegedly has a sexual encounter with a transsexual model.

episodes.name: Cutting the Cord
episodes.overview: Kendra takes baby Alijah to the pediatrician and decides to reach out to her mom, from whom she has been estranged for nearly a year.

episodes.name: Damage Control
episodes.overview: Fearing that she's going to lose all her endorsements, Kendra meets with her business advisers; Hank returns home and denies having cheated on Kendra, but she doesn't believe him.

episodes.name: No Beef Patti
episodes.overview: After not speaking for a year, a visit from Kendra’s mom leaves her with more questions than answers in the wake of Hank’s alleged sex scandal. Kendra struggles when Hank returns from New Mexico.

episodes.name: Girls' Night Bout
episodes.overview: A girls' night out turns ugly when Kendra learns of a shocking secret about Hank's alleged sex scandal, plunging her deeper into despair.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: Kendra wonders whether her marriage can be saved and lets her anger out when she confronts Hank about his alleged cheating. Also: Someone is taken to urgent care.

episodes.name: Moment of Truce
episodes.overview: Kendra is determined to learn why Hank won't confess the truth about his alleged affair; and after some soul-searching comes to realize her role in his silence.

episodes.name: Where's Poppa?
episodes.overview: With Hank out of the house, Kendra goes back to the Playboy Mansion to visit with her ex-boyfriend Hugh Hefner who gives advice about second chances; Kendra goes to find her father and get some answers.

episodes.name: Apartmentatized
episodes.overview: Kendra speaks to her father for the first time in 20 years, and he invites her to visit him in Costa Rica, but she's unsure whether she is really ready to meet with him.

episodes.name: Make Room For Daddy
episodes.overview: After Kendra and Hank attend their first couple’s therapy session, Kendra prepares for a life-changing trip to Costa Rica. After nearly 20 years of estrangement, Kendra anxiously awaits a reunion with her dad.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost and Found
episodes.overview: After nearly 20 years, Kendra and her father, Eric, reunite in Costa Rica. Kendra feels free and never wants the moment to end. Eric takes Kendra on a tour of the island. The two arrive at his home, where Kendra gets some parental advice on how to deal with the problems in her marriage. Kendra confronts her father on why he abandoned her.

episodes.name: Sons of Beaches
episodes.overview: Kendra meets her father in Costa Rica; Hank is confronted by the newest member of his family.

episodes.name: The Son-In-Law Also Rises
episodes.overview: Kendra returns home from Costa Rica to find that her mom is well aware of the father-daughter reunion and is not at all happy about it, so much so that she has vented to the press.

episodes.name: The Missing Peace
episodes.overview: Kendra is dealt a low blow when her mom trashes her on social media and gives a tell-all to the tabloids. Heartbroken, Kendra turns to Hank and is ready to make a decision about the future of their marriage.

episodes.name: Untold Story (1)
episodes.overview: Kendra's and Hank's first interview together since the scandal is sure to be explosive.

episodes.name: Untold Story (2)
episodes.overview: Don’t miss Part 2 of The Untold Story when Hank finally comes clean.

episodes.name: A Hard Night's Day
episodes.overview: With the details of Hank's sex scandal now out in the open, Kendra heads to London for work and play. When a racy photo of Kendra and a former footballer hits the press, Hank questions if Kendra's gone too far.

episodes.name: A London Bridge Too Far
episodes.overview: Kendra continues her wild time in London; Kendra's date with singer, Jake Quickenden, and interview with Matt Edmonson.

episodes.name: Homeward Boundage
episodes.overview: Kendra returns home from her solo trip to the UK after partying with an NFL player; Hank is hurt by Kendra.

episodes.name: Catty Shack
episodes.overview: Kendra questions if traditional married life is right for her. A therapy session leads to a tearful break down when she admits to texting other men after the scandal.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: A visit from Hank’s parents stirs up emotions in Kendra, making her question married life and her relationship with her mom. Past issues surface when Kendra considers contacting her mom.

episodes.name: Assistant Living
episodes.overview: Kendra asks an old friend for help after she agrees to take part in a celebrity cooking show in New York City.

episodes.name: Travails With My Aunt
episodes.overview: Kendra meets her long-lost aunt while working in New York City; and a night of partying leads to Kendra posing for some sexy photos at a gay club.

episodes.name: Thirty Is The New Kendra
episodes.overview: Kendra heats up the competition on a cooking show; Hank pulls off some big surprises for Kendra's 30th birthday.

episodes.name: Payback is a Holly
episodes.overview: Kendra's public trashing in Holly Madison's book outrages her and she confronts her former house mate about accusations.

episodes.name: Close Encounters of the Hank Kind
episodes.overview: Kendra reaches out to her ex, Hugh Hefner, after Holly's scandalous accusations. In couples therapy, Kendra admits to texting other men and intimacy issues after Hank's sex scandal.

episodes.name: The Sexorcist
episodes.overview: Kendra and Hank meet a sex therapist who gives them love energy exercises that prove challenging for the competitive couple. Frustrated, Kendra threatens to walk out.

episodes.name: Dots Amore
episodes.overview: Kendra and Hank go on an intimacy retreat; and Hank questions how serious Kendra is about strengthening their marriage.

episodes.name: Tantric and Treat
episodes.overview: Kendra and Hank invite Jessica and Kyle over for dinner to share what they've learned at their sex retreat. Kendra takes over the kitchen and shares some fun intimacy games with her friends.

episodes.name: Breast Intentions
episodes.overview: Kendra's dad, Eric, surprises the family with his new fiancée, Amy. Kendra's happy for her dad, but wary of Amy's motives. When things get wild at a Playboy Mansion party, Eric calls Kendra and Hank for help.

episodes.name: A Midsummer's Nightmare
episodes.overview: After a wild night at the Playboy Mansion, Kendra wonders if her dad's fiancée, Amy, is in the relationship for the wrong reasons. Amy apologizes and Kendra reluctantly gives her another chance.

episodes.name: Kendra's Time Out
episodes.overview: Kendra's wild night out with her friends takes a turn for the worse, when late-night clubbing with hot young guys makes Kendra break her promise to Hank, and he's had enough.

episodes.name: Hankless in Seattle
episodes.overview: Kendra's late-night partying finally pushes Hank over the edge. Hank gives Kendra an ultimatum and tells her she must decide. Kendra surprises Hank in Seattle to talk about their future.

episodes.name: Last Rites
episodes.overview: After Kendra's Seattle trip doesn't go as planned, she heads to her father's wedding in San Diego, but when Hank is nowhere to be found, she's left wondering if her marriage has passed the point of no return.

episodes.name: Return of the Jayde-Eye
episodes.overview: Kendra declares war when she hears rumors of her mother's tell-all book; a possible Girls Next Door reunion.

episodes.name: Snowblinded
episodes.overview: Kendra parties hard at Sundance and confronts rumors of her mom's tell-all; Kendra's flirting goes too far at a house party.

episodes.name: Where's the Beef?
episodes.overview: Kendra and Jayde question the likelihood of a Girls Next Door reunion. Kendra fears her mom’s rumored tell all will damage her relationship with her dad. Kendra asks LaVance for details on her fractured family.

episodes.name: Facing the Music
episodes.overview: Kendra gets surprising information from her friend LaVance that her someone from her past wants to meet with her. Kendra is concerned that reconnecting will lead to more public outbursts and more heartbreak.

episodes.name: The Birthday Presence
episodes.overview: Kendra wonders if she has any regrets after discussing a possible "Girls Next Door" reunion. Later, Jessica interrupts Kendra and Jayde's sexy video for Hugh Hefner's 90th birthday when she accuses Kendra of being insensitive.

episodes.name: Out Of Tune
episodes.overview: Kendra apologizes to Jessica after their recent fight and makes her a surprising offer. Later, Kendra wonders where LaVance's loyalty lies when he pressures her to meet with her brother.

episodes.name: Kendra Down Under
episodes.overview: Kendra heads to Australia for a new acting gig; Kendra questions her friendship with LaVance; Kendra makes a daring choice.

episodes.name: Melbourne To Be Wild
episodes.overview: Kendra shoots a pilot and walks the red carpet in Australia; Hank warns LaVance about the consequences of reuniting Kendra with her brother.

episodes.name: Close Quarters
episodes.overview: Kendra shares a beach house with her dad and Amy; Jessica gets the scoop on Amy's past; Eric encourages Kendra to reunite with her family.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Kendra faces devastating news about her Mum Mum. A reunion with Colin gives Kendra hope for the future but she's wary of seeing her Mom at the funeral.

episodes.name: Meat the Parent
episodes.overview: Kendra informs LaVance of her reconciliation with Colin; and LaVance shares information about Patti. Later, planning a "Girls Next Door" reunion leads to a meeting with Kendra's former roommate, Bridget Marquardt.

episodes.name: A Bridget Too Fa
episodes.overview: Kendra and Bridget confront their public feud and discuss the "Girls Next Door" reunion, Holly and their past. Later, Kendra has a meeting with a psychic in an attempt to heal her relationship with her mother.

episodes.name: Girls Gone Amy
episodes.overview: Colin contacts Kendra about coming to San Diego; Kendra is upset when Jessica invites Amy to a girl's night out.

episodes.name: Parting Gifts
episodes.overview: Kendra says goodbye to her childhood home; Kendra hopes to reunite with Colin with his father; Eric gets emotional.

episodes.name: Lust in Space
episodes.overview: Tensions run high on the set of Kendra's new music video when she is shocked by her new wardrobe; Kendra invites her brother Colin to a BBQ.

episodes.name: Home Runs
episodes.overview: Eric's surprise visit forces Colin to make a decision to reunite with his father; Bridget gives Kendra a special gift.

episodes.name: I Dismember Mama
episodes.overview: Kendra leaves boot camp fearing Patti's tell all book threat. Hank snubs Patti; Kendra keeps a secret. Patti gets an enticing phone call from a book publisher that could make Kendra's worst fear come true!

episodes.name: Publisher Perish
episodes.overview: Kendra keeps a secret from Hank; Patti breaks down in tears, upset by Eric’s role in Kendra’s life and hoping to reunite with Hank; Patti agrees to meet with a book publisher, but doesn’t tell Kendra.

episodes.name: Unhappy Birthday
episodes.overview: Hank loses it when he finds out about Patti’s tell all book threat; Patti has a secret meeting with a famous book publisher who digs for dirt on Kendra.

episodes.name: Terms of Endangerment
episodes.overview: Kendra shares surprising news with her mom; a shocked Patti learns how Hank really feels about her; Patti keeps a secret from Kendra; Colin and Patti are at odds.

episodes.name: Sex Tips and the City
episodes.overview: Kendra is all nerves at her NYC audition; a job offer causes trouble for Kendra when she makes a big decision without Hank; and Patti talks tell-all and family drama at girls’ night.

episodes.name: Patti Meltdown
episodes.overview: Hank snubs Patti; Kendra keeps a secret. Patti gets an enticing phone call from a book publisher that could make Kendra’s worst fear come true!

episodes.name: Truce or Dare
episodes.overview: Kendra storms out after giving Patti an ultimatum; Patti is urged to confront Hank; Kendra meets with an acting coach to prep for her sexy, new play; Hank is shocked when Patti shows up unannounced.

episodes.name: Forgive and Regret
episodes.overview: Kendra gets revealing news about her role in a Las Vegas play, while Patti makes a surprise visit to see Hank. Unable to regain Hank’s trust, Patti is forced to choose between fame and family.

episodes.name: The Last Temptation of Patti
episodes.overview: Kendra and Hank welcome Patti back into their lives beginning with Alijah’s birthday party. A lavish gift from grand-dude awakens a bitterness in Patti; and a last temptation has Patti going back on her promise.

episodes.name: As the Page Turns
episodes.overview: Kendra moves to Vegas and plans a wild bachelorette party but gets a shock when her mom shows up; Patti goes behind Kendra’s back and secretly writes a chapter of her tell-all book.

episodes.name: Frenemy Mine
episodes.overview: Kendra parties in Vegas; Patti storms out; when Kendra confronts Patti, Patti reveals she distrusts Jessica; news of Patti’s tell-all book shocks Colin.

episodes.name: Be Careful What You Wish For
episodes.overview: Kendra is tested at rehearsals for her Las Vegas play when they flip the script on her; Colin confronts Patti about her tell-all book; Kendra worries about opening night.

episodes.name: Playdates
episodes.overview: Kendra fears Patti will ruin her opening night; Patti splurges on an extravagant purchase using the advance from her tell-all book; Kendra spoils her kids in Las Vegas; Patti and her publisher devise a secret plan.

episodes.name: Be Careful What You Wish For
episodes.overview: Kendra’s tested at rehearsals for her sexy Las Vegas play when they flip the script on her; Colin confronts Patti about her tell-all book; and Kendra worries about opening night.

episodes.name: Playdates
episodes.overview: Kendra fears Patti will ruin her opening night; Patti splurges on an extravagant purchase with the big advance for her tell-all; Kendra spoils her kids in Vegas; and Patti and her publisher devise a secret plan.

episodes.name: The Parent Trapped
episodes.overview: Kendra's Sin City debut spins out of control when her mom and dad clash in a shocking family fiasco 20 years in the making; a surprise visitor spills Patti's shocking secret, leaving Kendra fuming.
